#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int t,n,m,j,i,prime[1000001],flag,p[1000001],temp;
int main()
{
prime[0]=1;
prime[1]=1;
for(i=2;i<=32000;i++)
 {    if(prime[i]==0)
     {for(j=2;i*j<=1000001;j++)
     prime[i*j]=1;}
 }
p[0]=0;
p[1]=0;
p[2]=1;
for(i=3;i<=1000001;i++)
    if(prime[i]==0)
        p[i]=p[i-1]+1;
    else
        p[i]=p[i-1];

scanf("%d",&t);
while(t--)
{scanf("%u%u",&m,&n);
  printf("%d\n",p[n]-p[m-1]);
}
return 0;
}
